synopsis.text:
The anime unfolds a poignant narrative, revisiting the storyline from the unique perspectives of its main characters, a year after the conclusion of the original series. The tale commences in the summer of 2013, with the spotlight on Menma, a deceased friend who once held a significant place in the hearts of the Super Peace Busters.

As the group reunites to pen heartfelt letters in memory of their departed friend, Honma Meiko, they embark on a nostalgic journey, reminiscing about their shared past. The film thoughtfully interweaves their cherished childhood memories, experiences during the original series, and the aftermath of their loss.

Each member of the Super Peace Busters takes the center stage at different points in the narrative, offering fresh insights into the main events of the original story. As they grapple with their shared history and the void left by their friend, they strive to find solace, strength, and the courage to forge ahead. This anime promises a profound exploration of friendship, loss, and the journey towards acceptance.
